question_text:
Question 15 
[RCC Structures : IS Recommendations & Fundamentals] 
 
 
Concrete of characteristic strength 30 MPa is required. If 40 specimens of concrete cubes are to be 
tested, the minimum number of specimens having at least 30 MPa strength should be 
 
(A) 35 
(B) 37 
 
(C) 38 
(D) 39 
Ans. (C)
explanation_text:
Sol. 
As per
 IS456:2000
, at least 95% of the specimen should have strength equal to more than the 
characteristic strength.
Given,
Characteristic strength 
a
30MP

Number of concrete cubes 
40

The minimum numbers of specimen 
0.95 40


38


PAGE
12

Hence, the correct option is (C).
